item.title: PM Types
item.description: My programming career has reached its 4th year in length (At time of writing). Within these years I have come across numerous PMs (Project/Product). Recently, my company has had its fair share of PM rotations. To be more specific, 2 left, 1 came and left, 1 came back to fill the void for a month and 2 came.
